Limited Size

Using the default PercentagePopupSizeProvider to limit max width to be 70% of the viewport width and max height to be 50% of the viewport height.

{{sizePopupVisible ? 'Close' : 'Open'}} Provider Popup
Hello, Hello, Hello. This is a long content that needs a scroll bar because the content is so long. We cap it at 50% of the viewport height as a reasonable default.

Selects

Basic Usage

{{ p }}

Selected Protocol: {{ protocol }}

SelectionModel

The selection model class handles the details of maintaining a selection. Use it and unlock the full power of material-select.

SelectionModel and SelectionOptions

Really take it to the next level with a SelectionOptions instance. It manages the list of options and can be updated on the fly using streams.
